content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price for the apartment is non-negotiable at the moment. I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware of the market value of the apartment. I would like to offer 550 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 550 euros per month is too low for me. I'm looking for the highest price possible. What's your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I hereby increase my offer to 575 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's better, but I'm still looking for more. What's your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Here's my next offer: 600 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 600 euros per month is still not the highest price possible. What's your next and best offer? Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: This is my final offer: 625 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [625] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
